channel.title: How do i make my self admin on a 508 server?
channel.description: How do i make myself a admin on my 508 server its rubik scape so idk but i cant find login.java help me[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 19, 2008, 10:43:39 am[/size][hr]plz help me

item.title: How do i make my self admin on a 508 server?
item.dc:creator: @RuneScapeWPS RuneScapeWPS
item.description:
@RuneScapeWPS wrote:

Actually if you go into Server Name->bin->data->characters->mainsave some characters are written in chinese or somethin, but some are in english. And you can just edit the part that says “rights”. For example

 username:owner password:11520536686 rights:0 absx:3250 absy:3433 height:0 runenergy:100 attackstyle:0 autoretaliate:0 specialamount:100 skulltimer:0 gender:0 look0:0 look1:10 look2:18 look3:26 look4:33 look5:36 look6:42 skill0:60,280410 skill1:70,740010 skill2:70,760010 skill3:78,1781154 skill4:1,10 skill5:1,10 skill6:99,200000000 skill7:1,10 skill8:1,10 skill9:1,10 skill10:1,10 skill11:1,10 skill12:1,10 skill13:1,10 skill14:1,10 skill15:1,10 skill16:1,10 skill17:1,10 skill18:1,10 skill19:1,10 skill20:1,10 skill21:1,10 skill22:1,10 skill23:1,10 skill24:1,10 null

That’s not admin, to make it an admin, change the rights part according to barrage’s post. He’s right in a way.
P.S. if you change login.java I think that you need to compile, if you don’t know how to, its Server Name->cmd->all.exe

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make my self admin on a 508 server?
item.dc:creator: @Barrage1 Denoria
item.description:
@Barrage1 wrote:

[quote=“telekinetic, post:2, topic:237593”]first go to your file and try finding the file “characters” clikc on it and you’ll see your name there clikc on your name and then search for “ctrl + f” “if playerrights” there u see a number 0=normal player
1=moderator
2=administrator
3=owner
4=secret admin
5=co-owner
and then they say that 10=secret co-owner (but i don’t believe that) so i hoped this helped :D[/quote]Dont post shit that wont help,
goto login.java search rights and then look for (“OLDOWNERSNAME”)
put your name in lowercase! highest rights on 508 are 2

Hope it helped.
Thanks,
Barrage.

Note: login.java can be found at src>palidino76>rs2>io>login.java

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make my self admin on a 508 server?
item.dc:creator: @telekinetic telekinetic
item.description:
@telekinetic wrote:

first go to your file and try finding the file “characters” clikc on it and you’ll see your name there clikc on your name and then search for “ctrl + f” “if playerrights” there u see a number 0=normal player
1=moderator
2=administrator
3=owner
4=secret admin
5=co-owner
and then they say that 10=secret co-owner (but i don’t believe that) so i hoped this helped
